summary.Title: Risk Specialist
summary.Presentation: Are you prepared to work with enterprise risk management in a group that works with some of the biggest companies in the world?

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Are you prepared to work with enterprise risk management in a group that works with some of the biggest companies in the world?

“At Stibo we are in the process of establishing a global enterprise risk management framework for reporting on established KPIs and detailed risks identified throughout the organization. We consider risk management an important part in our governance and decision making – and an enabler in our continuous growth as a group,” says CISO Martin Nielsen, Group Risk, Security & Compliance. To further strengthening our risk management capabilities, we are looking for looking for a Risk Specialist to work out of our HQ in Aarhus.

 

This is Stibo:

Stibo is organised in three independent companies:

Stibo Systems delivers software solutions which help many of the world’s largest companies to convert high data quality (MDM) into business benefits;

Stibo Complete is Scandinavia’s leading provider in the areas of developing, producing and distributing physical and digital marketing materials;

Stibo DX delivers software solutions to media and brand publishers all over the world.

More than 1,500 employees across 5 continents are all working towards one common goal: to provide excellence in technology and create value for our customers.

We have been around for a while but still have that scale-up feel, even with offices across the globe – from Tokyo over Amsterdam to Bogotá or Sydney. Our people are key to our success and together we continue to create a diverse, unique and exciting work environment.

This is Group Risk, Security & Compliance:

The Group Risk, Security & Compliance department is responsible for establishing and maintaining a high level of information security throughout the Stibo Group based on our 4 pillars:

  • Risk Management (Enterprise Risk Management, risk assessments etc.).
  • IT and information security (CIS20, security architecture, security tools etc.).
  • Compliance (ISO 27001, SOC 2, internal audits etc.).
  • Privacy (GDPR and other international, regional and national privacy regulations).

We are currently 5 people in the Group Risk, Security & Compliance department, working within and across our security pillars, and our new colleague will be supporting the ‘Risk Management’ pillar together with other colleagues of the Group Risk, Security & Compliance department.   

This is who we are looking for:

We are looking for a Risk Specialist to establish, operate and maintain an enterprise risk management framework for analyzing and reporting risks.

The projects and tasks of our new Risk Specialist will include, but are not limited to:

  • Designing and implementing risk management policies, procedures and controls.
  • Conducting and documenting internal workshops and risk assessments.
  • Support the process of establishing KPIs.
  • Supporting internal and external compliance obligations.
  • Supporting the risk management aspects of project management throughout the organization.

We expect that you:

  • Have strong language skills – preferably fluent – in English and possibly Danish.
  • You can communicate risk management principles to colleagues and provide reporting for top management.
  • Have an analytical mindset.
  • Have experience with (enterprise) risk management from similar job(s).
  • Preferably you have experience working with Impero or similar tools.

We offer:

  • A challenging position, where you as an individual will have a key role in establishing our risk management framework.
  • The possibility of working cross-functional within the Risk, Security & Compliance department.
  • Flexible hours.


As we are a global organization, we need to support all our colleagues around the world, so the position may require travelling and occasional meetings accommodating other time zones. This also means that we extend the same kind of flexibility towards your needs and everyday life.
